chunks.markdown: NNNN <::logo of Mountain View Electric Association, Inc. The logo features a stylized depiction of blue mountains with white caps. Below the mountains, it reads "A Member-Owned Cooperative" in smaller text, followed by "MOUNTAIN VIEW ELECTRIC ASSOCIATION, INC." in large, bold, dark blue letters. Below this, it says "Your Touchstone Energy® Cooperative" with the Touchstone Energy logo (three stylized human figures in red, green, and blue) to the right. : logo::>
Local. Trusted. Serving You. Falcon | Limon | Monument | 1-800-388-9881 Outage: 1-800-388-9881 Automated Pay-By-Phone: 1-877-999-3415 Website: www.mvea.coop Office Hours: 7 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. M - Th

Stay in the know about MVEA's services during Colorado's "Safer-At-Home" COVID-19 Executive Order by following us on Facebook or Twitter and visiting www.mvea.coop/covid-19-response.

This year, we invite you to attend your co-op's Annual Meeting of Members from the comfort and safety of your own home on June 4 at 6 p.m. Mail-In Ballot Only Election 50+ Chances To Win Bill Credits & Door Prizes Complete your mail-in ballot for a chance to win a $50 bill credit! $2,500 in bill credits, plus door prizes, will be awarded!
